name: Add a comment to a post
scenarioId: classpath:features/CommentBuzzPost:Add a comment to a post
methodName: Add a comment to a post

testSteps.description: Given user is on home page
Then user should be on dashboard page
Given user is on buzz page
When user types "this is a new post for testing on 8423455" on post input field

children.description: Type into post: this is a new post for testing on 8423455

testSteps.description: And user clicks on the post button
Then user can see the post with content "this is a new post for testing on 8423455"

children.description: Verify post available: this is a new post for testing on 8423455

testSteps.description: When user clicks on the comment button of the post with content "this is a new post for testing on 8423455"

children.description: Click comment button: this is a new post for testing on 8423455

stackTrace.methodName: user clicks on the comment button of the post with content "this is a new post for testing on 8423455"

testSteps.description: And user types the comment "Nice work" and Enter for the post "this is a new post for testing on 8423455"
